features: Auto Shutoff: After 15 minutes of inactivity the steamer will automatically power down.Volts : 120V
Continuous Steam: Lock the steam trigger into place to release a continuous flow of steam that melts away wrinkles in no time
Burst of Steam: Hit the steam trigger to generate a powerful burst of steam that blasts away wrinkles
Attachments: Use the included attachments for special jobs: upholstery, delicate fabrics and lint removal
body.description: Erasing wrinkles from clothing and freshening up fabrics is a breeze with the BLACK+DECKER Advanced Handheld Steamer. With 1400 watts of power and a preheat time of less than a minute, this steamer delivers quick and effective wrinkle-fighting performance, producing 45% more steam than the Conair GS23 Series*. The locking trigger lets you apply steam continuously or in small bursts, plus three attachments are included for removing lint, and steaming upholstery and delicate fabrics. So handy to use, it’s perfect for deodorizing and refreshing bedding, drapes and plush toys, and steam cleaning heat and moisture tolerant hard surfaces such as high chair trays and kids play surfaces as a chemical free alternative. The BLACK+DECKER Advanced Handheld Steamer puts the power of steam into a lightweight appliance for quick, everyday use, keeping your fabrics wrinkle-free and household steam fresh. *45% more steam than the Conair GS23 Series based on 3rd party testing, July 2016.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specifications Color: Grey & Blue Ready Indicator Light: Yes Steam Control: Continuous & Burst Cord Length: 15ft Easy-Fill Water Tank: Yes, 220mL (7.4oz) Comfort Grip Handle: Yes Attachments: 3 (Lint Frame, Delicate Fabric Frame, Upholstery Frame) Auto Shutoff: Yes Volts: 120V Warranty: 2 Year Limited Wattage: 1400W BLACK+DECKER Advanced Handheld Steamer Item #: HGS200 Erasing wrinkles from clothing and freshening up fabrics is a breeze with the BLACK+DECKER Advanced Handheld Steamer. With 1400 watts of power and a preheat time of less than a minute, this steamer delivers quick and effective wrinkle-fighting performance, producing 45% more steam than the Conair GS23 Series*. The locking trigger lets you apply steam continuously or in small bursts, plus three attachments are included for removing lint, and steaming upholstery and delicate fabrics. So handy to use, it’s perfect for deodorizing and refreshing bedding, drapes and plush toys, and steam cleaning heat and moisture tolerant hard surfaces such as high chair trays and kids play surfaces as a chemical free alternative. The BLACK+DECKER Advanced Handheld Steamer puts the power of steam into a lightweight appliance for quick, everyday use, keeping your fabrics wrinkle-free and household steam fresh. *45% more steam than the Conair GS23 Series based on 3rd party testing, July 2016

Features Extra Long Cord The 15ft cord gives you plenty of reach for steaming drapes and bedding. Auto Shutoff After 15 minutes of inactivity the steamer will automatically power down. Continuous Steam Lock the steam trigger into place to release a continuous flow of steam that melts away wrinkles in no time. Burst of Steam Hit the steam trigger to generate a powerful burst of steam that blasts away wrinkles.

Attachments Use the included attachments for special jobs: upholstery, delicate fabrics and lint removal. Easy-Fill Water Tank The 220mL (7.4oz) water tank is removable for easy filling. Compact, Lightweight Design The handheld design is comfortable to hold and easy to pack for travel. Ready Indicator Lights Operation is intuitive with an indicator light for power, preheat, and auto shutoff modes. Attachments Easy-Fill Water Tank Compact, Lightweight Design Ready Indicator Lights
Fast Wrinkle Removal With preheat time under a minute and 1400 watts of steam power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and efficient clothes steamer.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like that it is easy to use and has the options necessary to adjust depending on the clothes fabric.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for daily use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Love the lock feature so it continuously steams. Attachments are nice for delicate fabrics. Used for bridesmaid dresses for a wedding now use during week to keep clothes wrinkle free. Works well. Does not leak. Only negative is it is difficult to get the remaining water out of the tank. Too bulky for travel but that wasn’t my intention anyways.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does remove wrinkles
reviews.reviewText: I put away my ironing board and started steaming my clothes in 2017. Since then, I've had several steamers. Unfortunately, in my experience they tend to last about 1 - 1½ years. Although I attribute the lifespans toy usage of tap water and not the recommended bottled water.This is a decent unit. Its a little heavy but the steam comes out sttong. It heats up quickly. It doesn't splurt hot water. It gets the job done, but it doesn't get rid of the wrinkles as well or as quickly as other units that I've owned.Overall, it's a good and sturdy clothing steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does an excellent job
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for son for travel. He uses it everyday to freshen up his jeans, sweaters and the lint attachments for for anything that needs it. Make someone happy ...buy it today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I never knew I needed this till I have it. It was a Christmas gift and I am using it everywhere. It has the prefect balance and it's for fabric which alot are multi tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Puts out the steam!
reviews.reviewText: I use this product to steam clean my furniture, remove sticky labels from new purchases. Steam my shirts when they come out of the dryer wrinkles. Easy to fill. Excellent instructions. Gets up a good head of steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Maybe I was spoiled
reviews.reviewText: Maybe 4 years ago? my sister got me a steamer for my birthday and my whole life changed. Who knew your life could actually CHANGE over a freakin steamer!? Well, like 6 or so months ago it broke and my life was turned upside down. I have no idea which brand it was but it did have a stand and was on wheels. So, I tried to search for a replacement and I was too cheap to buy the nice one with the stand again so I settled on this guy. I figured it would take up less space and the quality should be the same because it's JUST a steamer, amiright? WRONG. This one is small but its still kinda bulky. The little canister is well, little and it just doesn't pump out as much juice as the old guy did. The other one was a one hitter and here I am throwing multiple swipes for the same result. Maybe I was just spoiled. This one is fine if you're a steamer newbie but if you're looking to upgrade I would suggest the mac daddy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good against wrinkles
reviews.reviewText: I use the steamer for fitted hats, heavy duty cotton t-shirts, and dress shirts, and it works perfectly fine. Though it does take a bit longer to steam up to what is advertised.
The media could not be loaded. Best product and worth the money!

Sí es algo pesada y se siente más si uno no está acostumbrado, pero es rápido quitar las arrugas de las prendas, entre más ligero sea el tejido es más fácil quitar las arrugas, no esperes que haga magia sobre telas muy gruesas. En lo personal me funciona muy bien con blusas y pantalones ligeros.Me parece buena compra.

The product is defective. Stopped working on the 4th application. I contacted Black and Decker and they said they dont aell this product, hence there is no service. Amazon does not take any accountability. What a wast of money.

Excelente producto, buen precio, la potencia es muy buena, genera mucho vapor que hasta se empañan las ventanas. Es fácil de usar, y por su tamaño es fácil de manipular. Esteticamente tiene muy buena presentación.En mi casa ya es el consentido, lo usamos para planchar la ropa y desodorizarla, limpieza de los sillones de la sala, y adicionalmente, es excelente para matar acaros y chinches.
